#Text=Join AARP
#Text=AARP , formerly the American Association of Retired Persons , is an organization which provides discounts and benefits to people over the age of 50 , as well as their partner or spouse .
#Text=If you 're interested in becoming an AARP member , you can sign up through AARP website , over the phone , or through the mail .
#Text=Membership is $ 16.00 a year , although you can save if you sign up for multiple years at a time .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Signing up on the Website
#Text=Visit AARP 's website .
#Text=The easiest way to sign up for an AARP membership is through the website .
#Text=Here , you 'll also find detailed information about the benefits of being a member , like where you can get a discount with your AARP card .
#Text=The website for AARP is aarp.org.
#Text=Fill out the form with your personal information .
#Text=You will have to provide your full name , date of birth , and address .
#Text=You will also be asked for your email address and , if you have one , the name of your spouse or partner .
#Text=Your membership fee covers that of your spouse or partner , so there is no need to pay extra for them .
#Text=You can find the application form by clicking the " Join Now " button at https://www.aarp.org/members/join-aarp-membership/ .
#Text=Select your membership term .
#Text=You can purchase a 1-year , 3-year , or 5-year membership .
#Text=If you opt for automatic renewal , your rate for a 1-year membership will be discounted by 25 % , bringing it to $ 12 .
#Text=Your rate will be $ 43 , a 10 % discount , if you opt for a 3-year membership and $ 63 , or a 21 % discount , for a 5-year term .
#Text=Accept the terms and conditions by checking the box at the bottom .
#Text=The terms and conditions include an acknowledgement that your card will be charged after your membership expires if you choose automatic enrollment .
#Text=You are also agreeing to accept emails from AARP if you provided them with your email address .
#Text=Click the “ Continue ” button to enter your billing information .
#Text=On the next page , you will be asked to select whether you are using a credit or debit card , an online check , or PayPal to pay for your membership .

#Text=If you ’re paying with a credit or debit card , you will need to enter the number on the front of the card , the 3- or 4-digit security code from the back , and the expiration date of your card .
#Text=You will also need to verify your billing address .
#Text=If you are paying with an online check , enter your bank ’s routing number , your account number , the account type , and your check number .
#Text=You will also have to check a box authorizing AARP to transfer funds from your account .
#Text=To pay with PayPal , tap the “ PayPal Checkout ” button and enter your PayPal address or the phone number associated with your account , then enter your password .
#Text=Follow the onscreen instructions to complete the transaction .
#Text=Hit the “ Submit ” button to complete the process .
#Text=Your card will be charged and you should receive a confirmation email shortly .
#Text=If you want to keep a receipt for your records , you can print or save the confirmation page .
#Text=Reaching out to AARP
#Text=Sign up over the phone if you prefer to talk to someone .
#Text=When you call , you 'll be asked to say " Yes " if you area member or " No " if you are not .
#Text=Say " No , " then when the prompt asks if you would like to become a member , say " Yes . "
#Text=You 'll then be transferred to a customer service representative to complete the process .
#Text=You 'll need to provide your name , address , birth date , and credit card information to the representative .
#Text=If you ’re in the United States , the toll-free number for calling AARP is 1-888-687-2277.
#Text=If you would prefer a Spanish-speaking representative , call 1-877-342-2277.
#Text=If you are outside of the U.S. , call +1-202-434-3525.
#Text=Fill out a paper application if you 'd rather apply through the mail .
#Text=If you prefer a traditional paper-and-pen approach , call or write to AARP to obtain a paper application , then fill out the form and mail it back to AARP .
#Text=The form will ask for your name , date of birth , address , and credit card or check number .
#Text=To contact AARP by mail , write to:601 E Street NWWashington , DC , 20049 .
#Text=Send an email if you have questions about your application .
#Text=If you want to apply for an AARP membership online but you need more information , send an email detailing your inquiry and how a representative can assist you .
#Text=Your email will be forwarded to the appropriate party , and you should be contacted back within a few days .
#Text=The email address for general questions is member@aarp.org.
#Text=If you do n’t receive an email back shortly , call the number listed above to speak to a representative .
#Text=Quick Summary
